Text:
hi there i have dowloaded this torrent but can only view them i cannot write using the fonts is there a program i require to do this ?
any info would be much appreciated

Have you placed each file in C: Windows / fonts? 
I would suggest not to throw all fonts into the folder, some computers will have little difficulty in handling so many.

Take a backup of your fonts folder and try put all in and if it is to many, then delete the folder and replace the backup. Then choose each fonts you need instead.
